exclusion:
Tap the Action Button.

The Main (blue) LED will be flashing when successfully excluded.
inclusion:
Tap the Action Button.

The Main (blue) LED will be on steady when successfully included.
label: DSC11
overview: Aeotec by Aeon Labs Smart Strip is a power board with 6 power points of which 4 can be wireless controlled. Customer can turn on/off their electrics when needed with manually operation or Z‐wave wireless control. Smart Strip has plenty of functions, for example the Over Current Protection and Surge Protection, these functions can efficiently protect people’s various electrics from damage.
usage: Hold down the Action Button (about 25 seconds) until the blue LED lights steady.

category.label: Light Bulb
category.description: Devices that illuminate something, such as bulbs, etc.

parameters.label: Voltage to calculate power
parameters.description: Line voltage used for device calculations of wattage

parameters.label: Selective Reporting
parameters.description: Enable selective reporting only when power changes
parameters.overview: Enable selective reporting only when power change reaches a certain threshold or percentage set in 4-11 below. This is used to reduce network traffic.

parameters.label: select channels to report consumtion as item 1
parameters.description: A binary field for reporting consumption (kWh) of channels
parameters.overview:
Choose the channel or channels to auto-report kWh based on a time interval set in parameter 111.  This is the LSB

 

 1 - report only a summary of all channels ( bit 1)

 2 - report channel 1 wattage (bit 2)

 3 - report a summary of all channels and channel 1 (bits 1 and 2)

 4 - report channel 2 wattage

<...>

14 - channel 3, channel 2, and channel 1

 15 - channel 3, channel 2, channel 1, and summary

 etc.

 127 - in the end is reporting values for each individual channel (1-6) and the summary data.  In binary, bits 1 through 7 set to 1.

 The bit values are as follows:

 1 - summary report

2 - channel 1 report

4 - channel 2 report

8 - channel 3 report

16 - channel 4 report

32 - channel 5 report

64 - channel 6 report

parameters.label: Select channels to report power as item 1
parameters.description: A binary field to choose channels to report power
parameters.overview:
Choose the channel or channels to auto-report wattage based on a time interval set in parameter 111. 

 examples:

 1 - report only a summary of all channels ( bit 1)

 2 - report channel 1 wattage (bit 2)

 3 - report a summary of all channels and channel 1 (bits 1 and 2)

 4 - report channel 2 wattage

<...>

14 - channel 3, channel 2, and channel 1

 15 - channel 3, channel 2, channel 1, and summary

 etc.

 127 - in the end is reporting values for each individual channel (1-6) and the summary data.  In binary, bits 1 through 7 set to 1.

 

 The bit values are as follows:

 1 - summary report

2 - channel 1 report

4 - channel 2 report

8 - channel 3 report

16 - channel 4 report

32 - channel 5 report

64 - channel 6 report

 2 - report channel 1 wattage (bit 2)

 3 - report a summary of all channels and channel 1 (bits 1 and 2)

 4 - report channel 2 wattage

<...>

14 - channel 3, channel 2, and channel 1

 etc.

 127 - in the end is reporting values for each individual channel (1-6) and the summary data.  In binary, bits 1 through 7 set to 1.

 The bit values are as follows:

2 - channel 1 report

4 - channel 2 report

8 - channel 3 report

16 - channel 4 report

32 - channel 5 report

64 - channel 6 report

parameters.label: Item 2 (power)

 127 - in the end is reporting values for each individual channel (1-6) and the summary data.  In binary, bits 1 through 7 set to 1.

 The bit values are as follows:

 1 - summary report

2 - channel 1 report

4 - channel 2 report
